Sept. 28, 1969 D Newcastle Invitation Contest
Newcastle Invitation Contest 0 Own Choice from a Specified List
newcastle-invitation-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
City Hall, Newcastle-upon-Tyne Test pieces were a choice of The Force of Destiny, Le Roi D'Ys or Le Carnaval Romain. 2nd annual contest promoted by Newcastle and District Trades Council. 10 bands competed.
March 22, 2013, 2:01 p.m. March 22, 2013, 2:19 p.m.
1 Reg Vardy Band Eric Cunningham Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wrigth]
2 Lochgelly Band Robert Oughton The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
3 Cooperation Band Robert Oughton Le Roi d'Ys
4 Crookhall Colliery Edmund Hoole The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
Unknown Result BHK (UK) Horden Band Unknown Le Roi d'Ys
Unknown Result Cowpen and Crofton Workmen's Band Unknown Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wrigth]
Unknown Result Dawdon Lodge Unknown Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wrigth]
Unknown Result Easington Colliery Band Unknown Le Roi d'Ys
Unknown Result Wansbeck's Ashington Colliery Band Unknown The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
Unknown Result Westoe Band Unknown Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wrigth]
